data.oai_dc:dc: PISCO: Physical Oceanography: moored temperature data: Soquel Point, California, USA (SQP001)

This metadata record describes moored seawater temperature data collected at Soquel Point, California, USA, by PISCO. Measurements were collected using a StowAway XTI Temperature Logger (Onset Computer Corp. XTI32-05+37) beginning 2010-09-16. The instrument depth was 020 meters, in an overall water depth of 21 meters (both relative to Mean Sea Level, MSL). The sampling interval was 2.0 minutes.
